name: Hilderlandia
description:
A simple pixel art and 2D platform game built with the aim of training OOP in C# and practicing development in Unity.

The programming was made by me, but the Assets are entirely authored by the talented PixelFrog, who makes his work available on the internet for free. This game was born using the technologies mentioned above and with the aim of honoring my curiosity, which one day made me interested in this area thanks to games. A lot can and will be changed/added, but for now enjoy my work 😃.
